definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: No suspected cancer cells or cancer cells were found.
sentences.chinese: 宮頸刮片檢查兩組均未查見可疑癌細胞或癌細胞。

sentences.english: All eastbound trains have been cancelled due to faulty signals.
sentences.chinese: 所有向東開去的火車由於信號錯誤而均被取消。

sentences.english: All non-Nepalese students enrolled at any of Hong Kong's universities are eligible to participate in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 所有非尼泊爾裔香港註冊大學學生均可參加。

sentences.english: Both men had direct contact with dead chickens when feeding carcasses to their dogs.
sentences.chinese: 這兩名男子均在將死雞屍體餵狗時直接接觸了死雞。

sentences.english: The Console should indicate that both subscribers received a copy of the message.
sentences.chinese: 控制檯應該指示兩個訂戶均收到了該消息的複本。

sentences.english: All laptops in our shop are brand new and authentic.
sentences.chinese: 本店所售筆記本電腦均爲全新正品行貨。

sentences.english: Chronic conditions are managed equally well with chiropractic or yoga.
sentences.chinese: 慢性病通過脊神經療法或者瑜伽均可獲得顯著療效。

sentences.english: Censorship of printed and audiovisual media.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸的印刷媒體和視聽媒體均受政府監控。

sentences.english: The results showed that there were plenty distributions of the labelled terminals within many pontine nuclei and medullary nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 結果觀察到雙側的許多核團均有順行標記終末出現。

sentences.english: All sub-assemblies can be oriented in direction as required by the customer.
sentences.chinese: 所有子配件均可按用戶要求的方向進行定位。
所有人員均撤出危險區。

sentences.english: P9 had a coiled-coil region; all five proteins have no signal peptides.
sentences.chinese: P9蛋白有一個螺旋捲曲區域，五個蛋白均無信號肽。

sentences.english: Maximal oxygen uptake and minute ventilation did not change in either group.
sentences.chinese: 最大耗氧量和每分鐘通氣量，兩組均未發生顯著改變。

sentences.english: The cooling water jackets are arranged on the welding torch from the front part to the back part.
sentences.chinese: 在焊炬上從前部到後部均設有冷卻水套。

sentences.english: Results ERG and electrooculogram (EOG) became abnormal with the development of the disease.
sentences.chinese: 結果隨着疾病的發展，ERG和EOG均出現異常。

sentences.english: All varieties tested lost yield and value in treatment 5.
sentences.chinese: 處理5所有參試品種的產量和產值均有損失。

definition: and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
to part or leave each other/to distinguish/difference/in different ways/differently/separately or individually
all are OK/both are OK/all can/both can/also can
that level or higher/that amount or more/the above-mentioned/(used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
